description: A customizable input component used to create text inputs with types.

properties.name: autoCapitalize
properties.description: Controls automatic capitalization in inputted text.

properties.name: autoComplete
properties.description: Hint for form autofill feature.

properties.name: autoCorrect
properties.description: Controls automatic correction in inputted text. Support by browser varies.

properties.name: bordered
properties.description: Indicates that the input should have a border.

properties.name: clearAriaLabel
properties.description: Aria label for the clear icon button.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the input.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether the form control is disabled.

properties.name: enterkeyhint
properties.description: A hint to the browser for which enter key to display.

properties.name: feedback
properties.description: Feedback to render below the input.

properties.name: includeClear
properties.description: Show the clear button within the input field.

properties.name: includeSearch
properties.description: Show the search icon within the input field.

properties.name: inputId
properties.description: The ID of the input element.

properties.name: inputTabIndex
properties.description: Determine the control's relative ordering for sequential focus navigation (typically with the Tab key).

properties.name: label
properties.description: The text to display within the label.

properties.name: maxLength
properties.description: Maximum length (number of characters) of value.

properties.name: minLength
properties.description: Minimum length (number of characters) of value.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair.

properties.name: pattern
properties.description: Pattern the value must match to be valid

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Text that appears in the form control when it has no value set.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.description: Whether the value is editable.

properties.name: required
properties.description: A value is required for the form to be submittable.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the input.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of form control.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the control.

events.name: inputBlur
events.description: Event emitted when the input loses focus.

events.name: inputChange
events.description: Event emitted when the input value changes.

events.name: inputFocus
events.description: Event emitted when the input gains focus.

scripts.title: Basic Usage
scripts.code: <modus-wc-text-input autoCapitalize="example-autoCapitalize" autoComplete="example-autoComplete" autoCorrect="example-autoCorrect" enterkeyhint="example-enterkeyhint" feedback="example-feedback" inputId="example-inputId" inputTabIndex="example-inputTabIndex" label="example-label" maxLength="example-maxLength" minLength="example-minLength" name="example-name" pattern="example-pattern"></modus-wc-text-input>
